briefTitle: Pharmacodynamics of Tafluprost 0.0015% Eye Drops: a Comparison Between the Preserved and Unpreserved Formulation

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Age 18 years or more
* A diagnosis of open angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension
* Prior use of prostaglandin(s)
* Intra ocular pressure of 22-34 mmHg in at least one eye

Exclusion Criteria:

* Females who are pregnant, nursing or planning a pregnancy, or females of childbearing potential who are not using a reliable method of contraception
* Previous participation in any clinical trial in which tafluprost was an investigational drug or use of contact lenses at screening or during the study
* Presence of any abnormality or significant illness that could be expected to interfere with the study

outcomeMeasures.title: Intraocular Pressures (IOPs) at Baseline
outcomeMeasures.description: IOPs at baseline: mean IOP values at four timepoints (worse eye)

outcomeMeasures.title: Overall and Time-wise Comparisons of IOP at Week 1
outcomeMeasures.description: The overall and time-wise, i.e. at 8:00, 12:00, 16:00 and 20:00, comparisons of IOP at week 1 (diurnal IOP and IOP value at given timepoint at 1 week minus corresponding value at baseline: unpreserved-preserved) were done using the RM ANCOVA model.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Time-wise IOPs at Week 4
outcomeMeasures.description: The time-wise, i.e. at 8:00, 12:00, 16:00 and 20:00, comparisons of IOP at week 4 (IOP value at given timepoint at 4 weeks minus corresponding value at baseline: unpreserved-preserved) were done using the RM ANCOVA model.

outcomeMeasures.title: Intraocular Pressures (IOPs) at Week 1
outcomeMeasures.description: IOPs at week 1: mean IOP values at four timepoints (worse eye)

outcomeMeasures.title: Intraocular Pressures (IOPs) at Week 4
outcomeMeasures.description: IOPs at week 4: mean IOP values at four timepoints (worse eye)

outcomeMeasures.title: Primary Pharmacodynamic Variable Intention to Treat Efficacy Dataset: Change From Baseline in the Overall Diurnal Intraocular Pressure (IOP) at Week 4 (Worse Eye)
outcomeMeasures.description: Overall treatment difference at 4 weeks (unpreserved-preserved) evaluated using a repeated measurements analysis of covariance (RM ANCOVA) model.

outcomeMeasures.title: Primary Pharmacodynamic Variable Per Protocol Efficacy Dataset: Change From Baseline in the Overall Diurnal Intraocular Pressure (IOP) at Week 4 (Worse Eye)
outcomeMeasures.description: Overall treatment difference at 4 weeks (unpreserved-preserved) evaluated using a repeated measurments analysis of covariance (RM ANCOVA) model.
